name: Lakshmi Aarti
title: Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
description: The most popular aarti dedicated to Goddess Lakshmi, the goddess of wealth, prosperity, and fortune. This aarti is performed during Diwali and other auspicious occasions to seek her blessings.
significance: Invokes the blessings of Goddess Lakshmi for wealth, prosperity, and success in all endeavors.

seo.description: Complete Lakshmi Aarti with lyrics in Hindi and English, meaning, and significance. Learn the proper way to perform Goddess Lakshmi aarti.

sections.title: Goddess Lakshmi Aarti
sections.content: The Lakshmi Aarti is a powerful devotional hymn that praises Goddess Lakshmi, the divine mother who bestows wealth, prosperity, and good fortune upon her devotees.

sections.title: Historical Significance
sections.content: This aarti has been sung for centuries in Hindu households and temples. It is especially significant during Diwali when Goddess Lakshmi is worshipped with great devotion.

sections.title: Complete Aarti Lyrics
sections.content: The complete lyrics of Lakshmi Aarti in Hindi with English translation.

subsections.title: Hindi Lyrics
subsections.english:
Om Jai Lakshmi Mata, Mother Jai Lakshmi Mata
Day and night we meditate on you, Hari Vishnu the creator
Om Jai Lakshmi Mata

Uma, Rama, Brahmani, you are Shiva's power Bhavani
Spread across all three worlds, your glory O Bhavani
Om Jai Lakshmi Mata

Whoever performs Mahalakshmi's aarti, man or woman
Experiences great joy in heart, heavy sins are removed from body
Om Jai Lakshmi Mata

Victory to Lakshmi Mata, Mother Victory to Lakshmi Mata
Day and night we meditate on you, Hari Vishnu the creator
Om Jai Lakshmi Mata
subsections.meaning: This aarti praises Goddess Lakshmi as the supreme divine mother who is worshipped by all gods and holds the divine weapons symbolizing protection and prosperity.

sections.title: How to Perform the Aarti
sections.content: Proper method and rituals for performing Lakshmi Aarti.

subsections.title: Preparation
subsections.content: Clean the worship area, arrange a thali with diya, flowers, incense, and offerings. Place Lakshmi idol or picture facing east.

subsections.title: Aarti Procedure
subsections.content: Light the diya, perform the aarti by moving it in circular motion in front of the deity. Sing the aarti with devotion while ringing bells.

sections.title: Spiritual Significance
sections.content: Understanding the deeper meaning and benefits of performing Lakshmi Aarti.

subsections.title: Divine Blessings
subsections.content: The aarti invokes Goddess Lakshmi's blessings for material prosperity, spiritual wealth, and overall well-being.

subsections.title: Removal of Obstacles
subsections.content: Regular performance of this aarti is believed to remove financial obstacles and bring success in business and career.
